stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements is true?

features.html:
x y
1 3
2 92
3 274
4 818

 

  • The two residual plots are stacked vertically. The upper plot is labeled "Residual Plot 1". The lower plot is labeled "Residual Plot 2".
  • The horizontal axis on both plots is not labeled.
  • The vertical axis on both plots has labels of negative 1, 0, and 1.
  • Residual Plot 1 shows four plotted points that are equally spaced relative to the horizontal axis.
    • The values of the four plotted points, from left to right, are approximately 0.45, negative 0.41, negative 0.53, and 0.49.
  • Residual Plot 2 shows four plotted points that are equally spaced relative to the horizontal axis.
    • The values of the four plotted points, from left to right, are 0, 0, 0, and 0.

A table of values is given for a data set that can be modeled with y as a function of  x . Two function models, linear and exponential, are constructed using regressions. Residual plots for the two regressions are shown.

choicesHtml: A linear model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 1 corresponds to the linear regression.
A linear model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 2 corresponds to the linear regression.
An exponential model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 1 corresponds to the exponential regression.
An exponential model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 2 corresponds to the exponential regression.
